name: Tier 4 Ranged Critical Hits (Levels 13-20)
description: Critical hit effects for ranged attacks at Tier 4 (Levels 13-20). Legendary effects for legendary adventurers.

results.text: Nothing Special - Your critical strike deals damage as normal, but no additional effect occurs.
Triple Pierce - Your shot passes through three targets in a line, dealing full damage to each.
Crippling Devastation - Your shot shatters multiple bones. Target's speed is halved and they have disadvantage on attacks until healed.
Mortal Wound - Your shot strikes a vital area. Target takes 3d6 damage at the start of each turn. DC 15 Medicine check or magical healing stops the bleeding.
Blinding Strike - Your shot damages the target's eyes. They are blinded until healed with Regenerate or similar magic.
Pinned and Helpless - Your shot pins the target completely. They are restrained until freed with an action.
Legendary Shot - Your perfectly placed shot deals an additional 4d6 piercing damage.
Instant Kill Shot - If target has 50 HP or fewer, they must make DC 20 Con save or die instantly. Otherwise, they drop to 0 HP.
